cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses the problem of continual learning in neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the broad category of machine learning. Specifically, the paper focuses on solutions to mitigate the forgetting phenomena in neural networks, which suggests that the paper is likely to be categorized under sub-categories related to machine learning, such as cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Additionally, the paper mentions tasks such as voice recognition, object recognition, and video games, which are all related to computer vision and natural language processing, suggesting that the paper may also be categorized under cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.CL (Computation and Language).
